item.title: Aloe Body Toning Kit
item.dc:creator: smartikastore
item.description:
Usage

WARNING: Do not use Toning Kit if you are pregnant or have had recent surgery, or if you have certain medical conditions including heart disease, phlebitis or circulatory problems. Prior to use, test a small patch of skin to check for allergic reaction.

CONSULT YOUR DOCTOR PRIOR TO USING PLASTIC WRAP. KEEP PLASTIC WRAP OUT OF THE REACH OF CHILDREN.

IMPORTANT
When using Toner and Conditioning Creme:

- Wash your hands immediately following application.
- Avoid contact with eyes.
- Do not apply to face, breasts or genital areas.
- If skin irritation or reaction occurs, rinse with water immediately.
- Do not apply to irritated or newly shaved skin.

FOR BEST RESULTS FOLLOW THE DIRECTIONS EXACTLY AS INDICATED.

We take pride in this excellent collection, so treat your body to what it deserves, and look your very best with Forever's Aloe Body Toning Kit.

The Aloe Body Toning Kit includes:

  • Aloe Body Toner

  • Loofah and plastic wrap

The post Clean 9 appeared first on Smartika Shop.
item.content:encoded:
CALL; +254702775369 NOW!

CAN YOU LOOK BETTER AND FEEL BETTER IN JUST 9 DAYS? YES!



CONTACT US ON +254702775369 FOR FREE CONSULTATION, BOOKINGS AND DELIVERY.

Today, more people than ever are conscious of their Weight,getting a Flat Tummy and living a healthy lifestyle.One in three women in Kenya is either overweight or has too much Belly Fats with most affected ladies being those in their reproduction age. What would you consider to be the ideal program for your friend who wants to shed off the extra fats and get a Flatter Tummy?

Most people think that going to the gym alone will get them in shape by helping them get a Flat Tummy and lose the extra Weight,but apparently not just that.So,atthis point I would like to introduce you to our world class Fitness Program that will give you just what you have been looking for.

THE CLEAN 9 FITNESS PROGRAM (C9).

The Forever Living C9 is a calorie-controlled diet plan and exercise program that can help you kickstart your journey to a slimmer, healthier you. This effective, easy-to-follow cleansing program will give you the tools you need to start transforming your body to get that Flat Tummy you have been admiring in only 9 days.


HOW DOES IT WORK?

This is the question we get from many of our clients who want to get started on the program either to get a Flat Tummy or lose some Weight.The program helps solve 5 key reasons why people don’t get a Flat Tummy or lose Weight easily and I will take you through that.


1.REMOVE TOXINS AND ACCUMULATED WASTE.

Did you know that your body can’t concentrate on burning Fats until you get rid of the waste you have accumulated over years without thinking about a detox program? We get toxins from the food we eat,polluted air we breathe and even the piped water we drink in our estates.Doctors recommend that we should detox at least 3 times in a year if we want to continue living healthy. How many times have you detoxed so far this year?

A proper detox needs a natural non-acidic product and that’s why we have Aloe Vera Gel® which is 85% pure aloe to help cleanse your body and remove the waste that has been accumulating leaving you with a clean gut that will now aid at losing the unnecessary Fats and get you a Flat Tummy.


2.BOOST METABOLISM RATE.

Have you ever came across people who eat very little but gain a lot of Weight in a short period of time? This is really disappointing but there is always a solution to stop this. A slow metabolism rate makes your body automatically convert around 70% of the little food that you eat into Fats that land around your belly,making it hard for you to get a flat tummy.

This issue can only be solved by Forever Therm® which is a multi-vitamin.a powerful and supportive formula to help boost your energy levels and kick-start metabolism, majorly contributing to your Weight loss and getting a Flat Tummy.


3.BURN FATS AND CONTROL APPETITE.

Admit it, cravings and crazy appetite make people not to be cautious about what they love eating.Poor eating habits majorly contribute to gaining Belly Fats and Weight in general. Fatty foods are not only unhealthy  but also weakens your immunity exposing your body to lifestyle diseases  like Cancer.


Forever Garcinia Plus® is a revolutionary dietary supplement, containing ingredients that aid in weight loss and helping you get a Flat Tummy. Garcinia works by inhibiting the enzyme which converts these calories into fat. As a result, the body will burn all existing Fat stores.


4.ELIMINATE TOXINS FRIENDLY.

Most people are concerned about if the detox and weight loss can be friendly.This is because some programs might give you a running stomach which is something to worry about. Forever Fiber is a gluten free starch that helps you avoid constipation during the program making weight loss a friendly experience.

Packet is small stick packs, Forever Fiber is water soluble and also gives you the feeling of fullness during the program which will fit in your lifestyle perfectly.

5.BUILD A LEAN MUSCLE.

After losing Weight or getting a Flat Tummy,do you want your skin to sag? I know nobody wants that at all.Losing Weight is one thing and maintaining the transformation is another thing.


Forever Lite Ultra is a protein shake with aminotein that helps your body tone up nicely after getting that flat tummy. Packed in two flavors,Vanilla and Chocolate,this protein shake replaces the empty spaces that were initially occupied by fats with a lean muscle reducing chances of attracting back the fats.Shake up your diet and lifestyle with naturally-flavoured, plant-powered protein.

Those are the main pointers that our program focuses on to make sure that getting a Flat Tummy and losing the extra Weight is not a wish anymore but a reality.

ANY SIDE EFFECT?

Having done fitness consultation for some time now, most clients ask us if our program has any side effects. That is a good question because it is good to be cautious about what you use on your body.
Our program does not have any side effects because all the products are natural, even their preservatives are natural and these facts are backed by science.

Approved in 165 countries in the world, the products are certified by different global seals of approval by standardization heavy weights.So,they are human friendly and easy to go by.

DIETING PROGRAM.

While on the program, we will recommend to you a 600 calories meal which fits the program. There is no big difference from what you normally prepare,only that we need to take note of the calories intake for you to get a Flat Tummy and lose Weight proportionally.


10 BENEFITS OF THE C9.

You’ll feel lighter.
You’ll have more energy levels.
You’ll have less joint pains.
You’ll have better hormonal balance.
You’ll have improved sex drive.
You’ll have better sleep.
You’ll have improved memory.
You’ll have less cravings.
You’ll have stress relief.

PHOTO GALLERY.

HOW TO USE THE C9.

The C9 pack comes together with a Guide book which gives you easy-to-follow instructions on how to successfully follow the program to achieve your goal.

Besides that,one of our top fitness consultants will also take you through the program for the 9 days via daily phone consultations which is free to make sure that you are following the program correctly to get the maximum results.

WHAT NEXT AFTER C9?

The Forever F.I.T Program has something for everyone.If you want to lose more Weight and get a more Flat Tummy after the C9, you need to take the next step to F15. Get inspired with F15 and learn how to break bad habits that may lead to weight gain. Change the way you think about food and exercise, build lean muscle and completely transform your body.


HOW YOU GET THE PACK.

We do FREE delivery using G4S countywide and abroad. Delivery is done immediately after payment and confirmation is complete. Delivery details you need to send us are; YOUR FULL NAME AND LOCATION.

Cash On Delivery is also accepted for people within Nairobi where you can come pick the pack from our Warehousing facility or it can also be delivered to your home or workplace.

HOW TO BUY.



SIMPLY ADD TO CART AND MAKE YOUR ORDER.

Payment can be done via the Company’s Lipa Na Mpesa Paybill Number , via Direct Bank transfer or via paypal. You can also pay after delivery. 
We will be more than glad to help you through your fitness journey. Thank you.

IF INTERESTED CALL US or SMS us +254702775369.

item.title: Fiber
item.dc:creator: smartikastore
item.description:
Best for weight management and metabolism control

Ingredients
Acacia gum, soluble corn fiber, soluble corn dextrin, fructooligosaccharides.

Usage

Mix one stickpack of Forever Fiber with water, Forever Aloe Vera Gel, or other beverage daily. For best results, pour contents of one packet into a glass, add your beverage of choice and mix thoroughly. You can also sprinkle on food. It is suggested to take Forever Fiber at least 30 minutes away from other dietary supplements as fibre may impact their absorption in the body.

The post Fiber appeared first on Smartika Shop.
item.content:encoded:
Fibre is a vital part of any healthy balanced diet and Forever Fiber makes it easy for you to add additional fibre to your daily intake. The convenient sachets contain a mild tasting, quick-dissolving powder, which can effortlessly add 5g of fibre – the equivalent of almost two slices of whole wheat toast – to any beverage.

item.title: Forever Garcinia Plus
item.dc:creator: smartikastore
item.description:
Usage

Take one or two softgels three times daily, preferably 30-60 minutes before meals.

  • Forever Garcinia Plus is suitable for any metabolism, fast or slow. It is not necessary to adjust the suggested amount per body size or weight.
  • While Garcinia is safe, it should not be taken by pregnant or lactating women.
  • You should consult with your physician prior to taking Garcinia, particularly if you have high blood pressure, diabetes, heart, liver or kidney disease.

Forever Garcinia Plus is a revolutionary dietary supplement, containing ingredients that may aid in weight loss. The primary ingredient is a natural substance derived from the fruit of a Southern Asian tree, the Garcinia Cambogia, also known as the Malabar Tamarind. The rind of this fruit is dried and used to produce a substance that is very similar to the citric acid found in oranges and other citrus fruits.

Specialists in plant compounds became aware of the remarkable qualities of this substance in the late 1960s, when they learned that it can temporarily inhibit the body’s production of fats from carbohydrates. During the normal metabolism of a meal, carbohydrate calories that are not used immediately for energy or stored as glycogen are converted into fats in the liver. Garcinia works by inhibiting the enzyme (citrate liase) which converts these calories into fat. As a result, the body will burn existing fat stores, thus aiding in weight loss.

When enough glycogen has been created and stored in the liver, a message is sent to the brain indicating sufficient food has been taken. This action is called a satiety reflex, and quells the appetite, reducing the desire for more food.

80 in stock

The post Forever Garcinia Plus appeared first on Smartika Shop.
item.content:encoded:
• Contains a natural appetite suppressant
  • Temporarily inhibits the enzyme that converts calories into fat
  • A useful tool in weight management
 

The post Forever Garcinia Plus appeared first on Smartika Shop.

item.title: Forever Lean
item.dc:creator: smartikastore
item.description:
Usage

Take one capsule with water immediately before meals or snacks, up to four capsules a day.

Forever Lean provides two revolutionary ingredients that can help reduce the body’s absorption of calories from fat and carbohydrates. The first of these ingredients is a unique, fat-absorbing fiber derived from the cactus plant, Opuntia ficus-indica, otherwise known as Indian fig, nopal or prickly pear. Studies have shown that this unique fiber has a very high ability to bind fats, compared to other types of plants.

The other unique ingredient in Forever Lean is a protein specially derived from the beans of the Phaseolus vulgaris plant, otherwise know as white kidney beans. This protein works by slowing the body’s absorption of sugar in the small intestine by temporarily inhibiting the enzyme activity that converts starches into sugar.

Together these two revolutionary ingredients can help you succeed in your quest to reach your ideal weight by helping to block the absorption of some of the fat and carb calories you ingest.

The third most effective ingredient in Forever Lean is Chromium Trichloride. Chromium is a very important trace mineral which helps the body’s natural ability to regulate blood sugar by acting as a GTF (glucose tolerance factor) cofactor. This is especially important for normal metabolism.

To maximize the effectiveness of this supplement, however, it is important to remember that you should also incorporate a healthy diet and regular exercise into your overall weight control regimen in order to achieve and maintain your weight goal.

80 in stock

The post Forever Lean appeared first on Smartika Shop.
item.content:encoded:
• Helps block the absorption of calories from fat and carbohydrates
  • Chromium helps the body regulate blood sugar for a normal metabolism
  • Temporarily inhibits the body’s absorbtion of calories from sugar

The post Forever Lean appeared first on Smartika Shop.

item.title: Forever Lite Ultra with Aminotein
item.dc:creator: smartikastore
item.description:
Usage

Blend or mix 1 level scoop with 10 fluid ounces of skim milk. (Use scoop provided.) For a special treat, mix with crushed ice or fruit. Shake can before each use.

A major part of Clean 9 and F15

 

Two servings a day of Forever Lite Ultra, prepared with skim milk as directed, supply a full 100% of the Reference Daily Intake (RDI) for the vitamins and minerals shown in the Nutrition Facts section. Forever Lite Ultra supplies the 18 important amino acids, including essential, non-essential and the branched-chain amino acids.

Forever Lite Ultra is also an integral part of Forever’s Clean 9 and FIT programs. It will help you take charge of your health and put you on the path to effective and sustained weight management!

Vanilla Ingredients:

Soy Protein Isolate, Fructose, Fructooligosaccharides, Dicalcium Phosphate, Natural Vanilla Flavor, Guar Gum, Aminogen* (Patented Protease Blend), Safflower Oil, Soy Lecithin, Disodium Phosphate, Ascorbic Acid, Sucralose, D-Alpha-Tocopheryl Acetate, Biotin, Beta-Carotene, Niacinamide, Vitamin A Palmitate, Zinc Oxide, D-Calcium Pantothenate, Potassium Iodide, Vitamin D3, Pyridoxine Hydrochloride, Brewer’s Yeast, Thiamine Hydrochloride, Riboflavin, Chromium Chloride, Folic Acid, Spirulina,

item.dc:creator: smartikastore
item.description:
Usage

Forever PRO X2 can be consumed as a between meal snack to help control appetite and cravings. It can also be used as an additional source of protein before or post-workout. Forever PRO X2 Cinnamon and Forever PRO X2 Chocolate are great choices as a morning snack or part of a breakfast meal for a boost of protein to start the day and can also be used as a delicious, healthy snack to provide extra protein anytime of the day.

Major part of F15

Forever PRO X? comes in two mouthwatering flavors ? Chocolate and Cinnamon. Both bars include Vitamin A, Calcium and Iron to keep your body fueled. A special fiber also doubles as a prebiotic to help your digestive system.

Each bar is packed with 15 grams of protein from three types of protein: soy protein isolate, whey protein concentrate and whey protein isolate. This tasty snack is the perfect way to build muscle and help you on your journey to looking and feeling better.
